mapper.select: SELECT BR.BR_ID brId, BR.USER_ID userId, BR.BR_DATE brDate, BR.BR_MATCHING_STATE brMatchingState, BR.DONATION_ID donationId, BR.BR_ALBUM_QUANTITY brAlbumQuantity, BR.BR_CONTENT brContent, A.ALBUM_ID AS "album.albumId", A.ALBUM_NAME AS "album.albumName", A.ARTIST AS "album.artist", A.COVER AS "album.cover" FROM BENEFIT_REQUEST BR, DONATION D, ALBUM A WHERE BR.BR_ID = #{brId} AND BR.DONATION_ID = D.DONATION_ID AND D.ALBUM_ID = A.ALBUM_ID

SELECT BR_ID brId, USER_ID userId, BR_DATE brDate, BR_MATCHING_STATE brMatchingState, DONATION_ID donationId, BR_ALBUM_QUANTITY brAlbumQuantity, BR_CONTENT brContent FROM BENEFIT_REQUEST WHERE DONATION_ID = #{donationId}

SELECT BR.BR_ID brId, BR.USER_ID userId, BR.BR_DATE brDate, BR.BR_MATCHING_STATE brMatchingState, BR.DONATION_ID donationId, BR.BR_ALBUM_QUANTITY brAlbumQuantity, BR.BR_CONTENT brContent, A.ALBUM_ID AS "album.albumId", A.ALBUM_NAME AS "album.albumName", A.ARTIST AS "album.artist", A.COVER AS "album.cover" FROM BENEFIT_REQUEST BR, DONATION D, ALBUM A WHERE BR.USER_ID = #{userId} AND BR.DONATION_ID = D.DONATION_ID AND D.ALBUM_ID = A.ALBUM_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BENEFIT_REQUEST (BR_ID, USER_ID, BR_DATE, BR_MATCHING_STATE, DONATION_ID, BR_ALBUM_QUANTITY, BR_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BR.NEXTVAL, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{brMatchingState, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{donationId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{brAlbumQuantity, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{brContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
